Text: Fw Bschool Recommendation forms Original Message From To Sent Tuesday December PM Subject Bschool Recommendation forms Jim Not sure if my first message made it through this is a follow up If you received the st then please disregard Hope all is well Me Im fine just following up on a few employment opportunities but gradschool is still my number one priority I appreciate your help in this process Attached you will find a sample recommendation form Please feel free to modify as you see fit When you are finished please include along with school forms I previously sent to you and send back to me using the FedEx information Account If you have any questions or comments please contact me at Thanks again for all of the help Yours Damon Harvey Sample recommendationdoc
MIT FORUMJoin the MIT Forum wwwmitforumtexasorg on Monday Jim
